Summary: large, red, non-blinking, slow-moving light seen at a distance of less than 200'
divs: sighting detailswhile driving home from laredo, tx to brownsville, tx on hwy 359 approx. 10-15 miles west of hebbronville at 2010 i saw what i believed to be a red light on top of a radio tower. i then noticed it had had a small white strobe to the right of the red light and thought this was unusual since i drive this route every week and had never noticed a white strobe. as i got closer, i noticed it was moving very slowly. as i got closer yet, i noticed a feint blue light to the left of the red light. the object passed over the highway in front of me at an altitude of approx. 200' at a very slow speed just immediately se of the jim hogg county airport over what i believe to be the gruy ranch entrance gate. i could not make out a shape of the object, but because of the configuration of the lights, it appeared to be oblong. i slowed down from a speed of 55mph to at least 15-20 mph as i passed the object now immediately to my left. after i passed the object, it hovered stationary and displayed multiple (10-12) ultra-bright strobe lights. i drove about a quarter mile further and pulled over to watch the strobes until they stopped at which time i looked at my watch which read 2020. i fumbled with my camera-phone but was unable to get a picture as i was too late. i then turned around to go look for the object as it was proximal to the airstrip and i thought if it was a helicopter i would surely see it at the airport. it was at this point that i noticed none of the usual lights or search beacons were turned on at the airport and they hadn't been the whole time i passed the airstrip. i turned into the airport on the main drive to see if i could see a helicopter. there were no lights on except for the blue runway lights and i did not see any aircraft whatsoever except for a small parked plane. i noticed a do-not-enter\private property sign on the drive and at this point i decided to continue on my way home with no further sighting. border patrol helicopters are commonly seen in the area, but i heard no noise and have never seen any aircraft whatsoever put on such a light display. the whole time i witnessed the object i had a surreal feeling and quite frankly felt excited and dumbfounded at what i saw. what was it???
